techmeme.title: Google, Intel, Meta, and others form the Ultra Accelerator Link Promoter Group to promote a new industry standard to connect AI accelerator chips (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Fidelity raised the value of its X position by 4.4% to $5.51M in April; since Elon Musk's October 2022 Twitter takeover, the position has been marked down ~72% (Dana Wollman/Bloomberg)
Google and Magic Leap partner to work on building immersive experiences that blend the physical and digital worlds, but offer few details (Katie Paul/Reuters)
Hands-on with Fire TV's Alexa voice search, rolling out now: powered by a custom LLM to take conversational requests, but the results are largely disappointing (Jennifer Pattison Tuohy/The Verge)
Hands-on with Sightful's Spacetop G1, an AR laptop that pairs with XREAL glasses to offer a 100-inch virtual display, shipping in October 2024 for $1,900 (Julian Chokkattu/Wired)
